



name:
	basal

description:
	memory storage structure for directories


utility:
	'''
	basal.JSON {
		"basilosauri": {
			"port": ""
		},
		"basal ganglia": {
			"path": ""
		},
		"PFC": {
			"path": ""
		}
	}
	'''

structure:
	archives
	
	sandbox:
		climate.py <- setup the basal db
		open.py <- uses basal
	
	modules_pip
		basal
			climate.JSON <- tinydb
		
	modules.pip.UTF8
